{{cpp/chrono/month_day_last/title|ok}}
{{cpp/chrono/month_day_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool ok() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks if the {{tt|month}} object stored in {{c|*this}} is valid.

===Return value===
{{c|month().ok()}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
 
int main()
{
    auto mdl{std::chrono::February/std::chrono::last};
    assert(mdl.ok());
    mdl = {std::chrono::month(42)/std::chrono::last};
    assert(!mdl.ok());
}
}}
